values:
sorry for not bein the person you all think i am. i'm weak. i'm helpless. i'm scared. i'm wierd. i'm stupid. i'm flawed. i'm in love.



so0o. forgive me maybee

So me n joanne decided to put this in our Lj after it happened: me n joanne r chillin on the bench in the main breezeway n there goes mrs berger, retarded as ever wlkin by us. we both look up n she jus laughs her ass off, points at us kinda, n keeps on wlking. WTFF>?!?!?!?!  lol ohhh joanne that was funny.
yea me n her had a good chuckle. 

yea shit sucks lately. = /        fuck it alllll

so like 20 min ago i was chillin in here n i wlked out to take care of my nails bc they look like shit n i come back in and the new MCR song is on and i sat down n chilled n listened to it n by the time it was done, i was tearing. it jus made me cry. not bc it reminded me of anything, it was jus so, so,....moving.... i guess u can say. i duno w/e i cried, there.

whyTheFuck would he go see a movie instead chill wit his gf ? no fucking clue.go. go see a movie. w/ ur reptile friend. go do that. havent been pay much attention to me lately anyway. n blamin that on other shit. n when the oppurtunity comes up u push it to tha side. u better fuckin hope ur chillin wit me tomm nite bitch-ass.. (its funny bc he wont even b readin this anyway so its useless)   {[(iLoveYou babee)]}

k fuck the rest of this. i'm offf.

ps. anyone who thinks i've started smoking doesnt kno the fuckin half of it so FUCK u.
pps. i watch a woman give birth in health class today. 'nuff sed.
ppps. Mr Brrrian.. 7 ?

yes so the other entry was jus yeaa,,..
u get it

so today me n mell forgot bout pickin up her mom n we had the trailblazer n earlier she had called it the boat SOo0O00oo0 as we ran out her door shes like ahh "quik!" im like "quick, to the boatmobile !!!!!!!!"  that was soo fuckin funny,..
then on our way home from ramapo vally country reservation (i memorized the name) there was a road block wit police cops directing traffic n earlier today we were at BK n got the crowns (gay yeaa i kno) n  so the cop lets mell go but then tells us to stop n at first mell didnt hear him so i was like DUDE STOP n she did n i thought we were in trouble n then he looks at us n goes," ur kidding me with those hats, right" n we laughed it was so fuckin funny but we didnt laff to much in front of him but wen we pulled away we fuckin LAFFED  out asses off. it was too good.

so that was fun shit. n shit happened tonite but thats abunch of crap n i dunt wana tlk bout it here.

joe loved what i got him. hes gona gimme his gecko (yey!!) <333

kk im done, partyin on friday, b THERE. gnite

List ten songs that you are currently digging... it doesn't matter what genre they are from, whether they have words, or even if they're no good but they must be songs you're really enjoying right now. Post these instructions, the artists, and the ten songs in your blog. Then tag five other random people to see what they're listening to.

1. Fallout boy- sugar, we're goin' down
2. hawthorne heights- ohio is for lovers
3. lynyrd skynyrd - teenage wasteland
4. no doubt- simple kind of life
5. foo fighters- best of you
6. chronic future- thank you
7. Nirvana- aneurysm
8. Led Zeppelin- stairway to heaven 
9. the verve- bittersweet symphony
10. greenday- longview

I tag...
1. hollowdream
2. justscream
3. burning_sun17
4. weak_emotions
5. xx_savvy_xx 


OHHH yess. i have alrede been tagged by 2 peeps

quick update b4 i go to bed.

-my b-day was kool, i had my 2 CLOSE friends sho up on my doorstep singing happy b-day, trish singin at the top of her lungs haha,.. we had that cake plus one that my mom got. i spent that nite wit my loverr n those 2 kool chikas. we went outside n chilled for a lil bit, me n joe switched shirts (n we switched bak later) n we ran around taggin eachother (thnks mell) n stuff like that. it was goood.

-friday nite i chilled wit kath, matt (shepdog), and tom,.. we went to preakness where i saw A BUNCH of pple including yoo young, jimmyB, brian, erin, n tons of others.. it was kool. the quote of the nite .. (tom was tellin a story) ,.... Shepdog:"tom, this story DOES have a point....rite" good shit

-saturday i woke up pissed. i was workin around the house + work where i got a couple more presents from joe including a cute lil figurine thing of 2 puppies, one in a picnic basket. it was sooo fuckin CUTE. iLoveHim. it made me feel better jus to see him.

-sunday i did shit off of 4 hours of sleep. fuckin fantastic. i went to this company picnic for my moms work. tried sleepin, that FAILED. i told my mom she "lies like a rug" rite in front of her work buddies lol. they all laughed. n i won them over n they have no idea how it could be "cute lil innocent ashley kucko" thats done all the crazy things my moms told them about (hahaha score one for me)

-and monday? went n got a haircut wit mell, then food at the diner, then her physical therapy, then work. which was chill even if my boss worked til closing.

AND NOW IM DONE AND MAY NOT UPDATE TIL THE END OF THE WEEK AHH YOU'RE ALL INVITED TO BE AT MY HOUSE AT 6:30 on FRIDAY of THIS WEEK.

It is my birthday. rite now. i'm 17 fuckin years old. how hott is that ?!   ...my b-day party shall b on the 19th,.. its official. that gives me more time n shit, the apartment isnt done yet ... so there we go. i will take a shitload of pics so that will b fun. ohh the memories.

so my day is semi-planned out. i'll b wakin up later, maybe breakfast/lunch wit chels (if she can see) then i duno whats goin on, then working 4-9, which is when i will be gettin my surprise from joe andi have NO clue as to what im gettin. all i kno that theres more than one thing n its gonna b rele sweet n adorable n yaa.. sooo yea im excited.

as for today? it was koool. trish spent the nite so she was here. we chilled. joe came over n we all chilled. he left,.. a lil bit later mell came n we made our way to friendly's. its the new "spot" lol. we went over to the car wash, ausome shit. drove over to coconuts, then to cd world, then to applegates for ice cream, drove over to my work so i could get joe a sandwich n a drink. cuz he was in need of it. yeaap,.. got slush puppies, then in the direction of chels' house (stopped fer gas n saw dave which was nice) n i got my sunglasses bak frum her house. then went over to hershfield so i could see the skate park. then chilled at mell's. came home, washed dishes, n joe came by n hung out till 10:30 ish. good stuff.AND that leaves me here. chillin.

i am so excited. n i JUST cant hide it. keep nex friday open n i will eventually tlk to everyone. luv all ! <3

"sugar, we're goin down swingin'  "  i love that SONg ahhhh.

so, not much goin down. yesterday i went down the shore (finally, first time all summer) n i pinkend myself hehe. oh well, it'll go away n turn into a tan (holla !)

shit is goin on smooth for the most part, but as of rite now its realy bumpy.  this shit is makin me feel guilty n it wasnt me that did anythin. but i feel guilty n everyone just KEEPS layin on the guilt. FUCK

b-day party may jus have to b the 19th . dont kno if the apartment will b done any sooner. oh welll
my real birthday is on thursday WHOAOJAHA !!  yeaa

I am in what could possibly be the worst fuckin mood EVERR... people are REALLY pissing the shit outta my bf and im in such a fuckin violent mood i seriously would love to meet one of his ex's n kick the fuckin living shit out of her. 
as for my ex's ?  well i took about 5 whole seconds n thought that the whole almost 5 fuckin month relationship over a yr ago was possibly the worst fuckin shit i been thru. thats rite. and u kno what, i DONT GIVIN ONE SHIT.   FUCK YOU. this is goin on public bc i WANT everyone who's everyone to read this shit, i DONT care. do shit to me, SEE what fuckin happens. i have so much anger in me that anyone who wants to fuck around will b in for a surprise in the worst fuckin way.
i could list out all the fuckin guys i been wit n say the worst shit about all of them but u kno what, i'll fuckin spare u ALL the shame. but one thing, fuck you alllll.  i try to be so nice about shit, u kno. i say  i want to b friends bc i mean it, i dnt say shit i dont mean. but u kno what, if u wana b a stupid lil piece of shit then go rite ahead bc ur no fuckin loss to me. im not the one begging for attention. im not the one that needs to go out to find a person to b wit n fuckin flaunt the fact that ur single n u "love it" yea, IIGHT, i am jealous now. FUCK YOU. fuckfuckfuckfuckfuckfuckfuckfuckyou.

venting. it feels good everyone now and again. SUGAR WE"RE GOIN DOWN SWINGING =D
i love joe. i really do. n thas our song =)  that n ohio is for lovers  (big smile) not that it actually means shit, jus that we both like the songs n we tlk bout them together n AHHHH its so hard to say goodbye especially when hes tellin me he loves me,.. n all i wana do is hold him n tell him i love you a million times over jus to assure him that i really do, n the whole world isnt a dick the way everyones been to him his whole life. i love him so much, i care about him, i want the best for him, n i'll fuckin build my life around him bc he is my life. hes the world to me n without him id have too much darkness n i wouldnt b able to survive. NOW THATS FUCKIN POETIC CORNY RELATIONSHIP SHIT  =)   ... thats what he'd say hehe. i love him

we watched tv after work today at my place n he is prob goin to have din din wit ICP n the other hatchet-man bands.. ( i fuckin forgot the names of the others !! ((growl)) kool shit tho)

oh and the phone bill. 50 bucks higher cuz of my texting. hehe.. better lay off a lil... maybe i'll only go up to like, 200 which will b the absolute MAX.thats it. lets see if it works.

BYE. <3

Argg.. u kno, red bull does NOT work for me. i had it friday. nothing. today?? for breakfast?? nothing at all.. ( it was bc we tlked about it in psychology that wanted me to try it)

ahhh.. so as i was buying my red bull, there sits henry baum, allys cousin (matt.. cant spell the last name), jeremy namouff (sp?) <<actually he was at the register.. so i was like wow..
 
trish to henry: hey u go to our skool.. at least used to..
henry: noo! never did!
me: henry shut up yea u did u were in my business class
henry: runs into street screaming out jibberish..

that was pretty funny. so then not much yesterday.. my dads bootleg DVD of starsky and hutch> not working (bastard!) so we watched tomb raider:cradle of life.. trish left in the middle of it..

ok then today i woke up
did chores

more chores

ryans house
park (tire bits! so fuckin ausome! jumping up and down is magical now! no more woodchips)

MORE KIELBASA from the fire place

i'll tlk to u peoples later. bye

<3 awww he takes my breath away, i love it <3

its so sad. all i can say.. as i said goodbye, i couldnt stop my crying. it was like rain from my eyes.. i feel fuckin BROKEN.

uhm good news DOES come to me. finally. w00t

this is like the shortest entry ever. oh well

i'll ttyl.....

"I will treat u well, my sweet angel, so help me jesus."

~tired of it. i can't relate.^^

so i wish i knew what was going on with me bc i dont kno and i dont kno what i want.. and nobodys here to help.

i hate this all and i cant b fooled no matter what. my throat hurts and i rele cant win. 

yesterday was a great day. i hung out with pple that arent in the norm. i <3 kevin and we TOTALLY made out. lol (trog dor!) oh and my wierd beowulf cries in the costume (smoking a cigarette) haha. i still have yet to ask my dad about going on the quads but i swear it'll b kick ass.

im tryin to figure out what it is i'm suppose to do with the plate i was dished out. theres sumthin specifically i think i should do but i'm not absolutely positive so i dont think im gonna tell...

i havent tlked to my family members today. not full conversations anyway. the only way im writing this is bc NOONE is home. bc they leave and dont tell me where they r going. last nite i felt ignored so today im doing it rite bak to them. especially my mom. even though today we r going to celebrate my moms raise from work, i dont care. 

last nite i said mom, phone. and she didnt reply and i was like RIte by her so i figure hmm, maybe she fell asleep..? so i look at her n she just ignored me so i go mom, PHone.. and she looks at me and takes it bc im rite on her face.. im like yea fuck u too. i felt ignored. and i think thats what it is that truly gets to me bc i had this overwhelming feeling of disgust n i just didnt wanna tlk to them. she apologized after church. i walked on. she said "forgiven?" and i stared straight ahead. im still making up my mind if she is.

yea. i've been havin thoughts of so much and its a lot believe me so i decided to spill sum over here .

i'll see u in skool or sumthin. u can comment if you'd like, though i doubt it.

just a quick update. and comment if u like.....

Blindsided

Here i go,

pathetic, yes, i know

blind, i can't see

i dont know whose face it is in front of me

i'm totally obsolete

my legs are feeling like concrete

feel my way to the door

i dont know anymore...

You dont know me

i dont know you

we dont know

just what to do

society screams in our face

such a horrible place

we fall without grace,

without a trace

fall to the sky

we dont understand why

everyones feeling of deflections

thinking they need their possesions

who are we to say

that we fell with dismay

falling through our door

not knowing of our war...

(chorus)

who knew falling,

could feel so high,

you live a life,

that makes you want to die.......

(the cookie is still in the process. its comin')  

g-nite to all

I so wish someone would tell me wuts going on.

I dont kno wut i should think rite bc i mean i go to read EVERYONES lj and all i see is depression. now im not tryin to b like this all-holy-dont-b-sad person but its just wierd bc almost everyone has sumthing depressive to say and all these people hapen to b my friends so that makes things even worse. so i dunno.

tonite is probably katherines lil party. it should b all in fun.

"there are things known and things unknown and in between are the doors..." < ausome. if u name the speaker then u get a cookie. and ur just fuckin cool.

Duran Duran is coming out with a new album. kick ass.

so anyway, my mom is listening to my killers cd. wow. thats great. i <3 that cd and wow, she can hum to it very nicely.. thats just.. wow.

i havent done much this weekend so far. (as my cousin sits in my lap.) i got kicked out of my room bc my family came here for overnite so that ment my mom let me sleep over sum1s house on friday. that would b mell. FUn. played ddr for like, an hour n a half. wow. then we watched viva la bam (kick ass) then for sum reason i watched pimp my ride.. hahahahahaha

so i guess im done.

hmmm tlkin to dan now (totally kick ass) and otherwise....nothing . uhm i'm all lookin for jobs and its not easy and I HATE FILLING OUT APPLICATIONS! ahhh.  

ok so im just randomly using different colors in my lj bc i WANT TO. hrmm... (dan = funny, btw) so today i didnt do much .. just went to the mall, DDR like wut, then after that i wlked over to bath n body works then to mandees for job application stuffs. (cant concentrate)       

so i'm sorta in this wierd place rite now i dunno wuts going on with like, EVERYTHING and yea i dunno .. im probably confusing the shit out of u pple but thats all i can say at the moment.. 

                                                                                     

ahhhh i guess i'm done. i'll tlk to anyone later, yea...

hrmm
sry. it was flowinggg... uhm anyway so0o i am scared of this and of all that'll happen b 4 halloween even comes around the corner. theres so much that'll b happening and a life change will be going on and im afraid of it all. ~i've known u since elementary skool and u r the only person i've stayed good friends with since then and it makes me all saddened to see a super person move like, TOTALLY across the country.
i'm not too good with these things. mainly bc it hasnt happened b 4...~

<3

damn. ok i won't mention him bc its the last thing that i'd like to think about. so yea.

anyway. today it skool it was freezing. thank god for jeff ezzo. i <3 that kid. and his sweater was so damn comfy. i need one like that, hehe. (if u want to destroy my sweater.. hold this thread as i walk away...........)
ok yea...

otherwise today wasnt THAT bad.. my walks home with ally will always b imprinted in my memory. i remember al those times i got yelled at bc i was talkin with ally on my street corner instead of going home. haha (whoops!)
THERE WILL B A PARTY, MAYBE BY THE OLD PATHMARK WITH FOOD STUFFS, MUSIC, AND A WHOLE LOT OF FUN. THIS IS FOR OUR BELOVED.
(details will eventually come)

ill tlk to u people tomorrow.

LIKE ITS ALL MY FAULT.
and please tell 'em im sorry.

i dont kno anymore >> where i stand, what i kno, who i love, who loves ME, what im doing here, why im ignored, y im the last to b ignored, why im the ass hole,why i feel upset...

..and one day, i'll laugh at you. (hahahahaha. he's bi)

anyway... i just want u pple to kno thhhaaaat.. my bro finally got his PERMIT. he doesnt kno how to drive though (hahaha)

ha ok... and trish, read my previous entry bc thats wut i was tlkin about in skool. its for YOU! <3

and yea.. i still cant understand wut my mind is puttin me through and y its being soo cuh-razy... and y all these chemical balances or imbalances have to occur in my body causing myself to feel something that part of me wants to forget (damn i feel like JJ from our summer reading..)  
i want to forget but then i also dont want to.. maybe ill learn more about it in psychology. hrmm.

thats it i guess... 

>>whenever i see a specific sumone (which is fairly often) i get the feelin again and i cant help it.. KRISTEN DiPERI!! u kno who!!!! oh man..<<

ahhh, polish weddings.. so i drank a lil bit. hehe .. yummy margaritas.. its all i have to say. ha

ALMOST went bowling tonite..buuuuuut the alley was taken by the 'bowling league' .. =(

skool tomorrow.. (still feels wierd sayin it)

I walked into the place with my dad and thought of turning around for a moment. All the faces looked at me and thought i may have been just another one of those preps that comes in to get their lower back done. No, that wasn't me though. I had something else in mind. A dragon. All black, nothing too complicated, unlike my fathers. His was indeed smaller though, and near his hip. Mine, I decided, will be put in my lower left leg.

I went up to the first burly, tough looking guy that worked there and told him about my appointment. As he walked behind the counter, he asked me what it was I had in mind, and I reached for the picture in my pocket. I unfolded it with care and nervousness. He noticed the intense look in my eye and told me that the first one is always the hardest but it won't be too bad. Believe it or not, that made me feel a heck of a lot better. He told me to follow him, and sat me down in a chair as he studied the photo.

Before I knew it, I had one leg up, more elevated than the rest of me, and I was lying back as if I was just laying around, nothing to worry about. What seemed to be out of nowhere was this pinching feeling which told me he had started. My dad, smiling a warm smile, told me to calm down a little and that it will all eventually be done with.  I smiled back and decided i would not let a tear drop. As the stinging went on, i thought hard about anything other than the odd burning sensation i felt on my lower leg. It was new to me, but somehow made me feel better. I felt good. I liked it. I closed my eyes for a little while, feeling the needle and every time it made another permanent stain on my body. I looked up at the man doing this for me, and he stopped for a moment, admired his work, glanced at my face, and gave me a sure smile of reassurance.

He finished up the last spot, and told me to stay like that so he can put this special bandage on it. He said to keep it on for as long as possible to keep my new piece of body art from developing any type of infection. I made sure of it. He then told me that if anything were to look like it was not finished or if I found a flaw, to come back and let him know. I thanked him for everything and as I walked outside with my dad, i surrounded him in a big, heartfelt hug. I kept thanking him for taking me and allowing me to do this. Now, after what seemed to be countless hours, I took a peek at it and decided I had the bandage on for long enough, and my leg wanted to breathe. I think I'll rebandage it later. This is it.
